description:
**Fix Overview**:

To streamline the installation process for updating the WinRE partition while addressing security vulnerabilities:

1. Download the PowerShell script available at the following link: [KB-5034957](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034957-updating-the-winre-partition-on-deployed-devices-to-address-security-vulnerabilities-in-cve-2024-20666-0190331b-1ca3-42d8-8a55-7fc406910c10).
2. Execute the script in a PowerShell environment to automatically handle the whole installation process, including partition resizing.

**Details**:
- This approach simplifies maintenance on deployed devices by automating necessary system updates to the WinRE partition.
- Ensure you run the script with administrative privileges to allow changes to the system configuration.
